edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints

Class StudentSQLiteOpenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints.StudentSQLiteOpenHelper

  • public class StudentSQLiteOpenHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing student data.
    Author:
    ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StudentSQLiteOpenHelper.StudentCursor
      A convenience class that wraps a cursor that returns rows from the students table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COLUMN_ID
      The title of the column containing the unique ID of a student.
      static String COLUMN_IMAGE_NAME
      The title of the column containing the name of the image associated with a student (if any).
      static String COLUMN_NAME
      The title of the column containing the name of a student.
      static String COLUMN_NUM_STICKERS
      The title of the column containing the number of stickers associated with a student.
      static String TABLE_STUDENTS
      The name of the table storing student information.

      StudentSQLiteOpenHelper(Context context)
      Creates a StudentSQLiteOpenHelper for the 'students' database with the given context.

      • insertStudent

        public long insertStudent(Student student)
        Inserts the given student into the students table of the database. If the student was successfully added, changes the ID of the student to reflect the student's unique ID in the database. If the student was not added, sets the ID of the student to an invalid value.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to insert
        Returns:
        the row at which the student was inserted, or -1 if an error occurred

      • updateStudent

        public int updateStudent(Student student)
        Updates the given student in the database.
        Parameters:
        student - the student to update
        Returns:
        the number of students in the database that were updated

      • deleteStudent

        public int deleteStudent(long id)
        Deletes the student with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the student to delete
        Returns:
        the number of students in the database that were deleted
